name: rajesh kumar
review: We dont have cafeteria for food and only one coffee shop , that too you should go to ground Floor.

name: Kishore Kumar Nandakumar
review: Lengthy journey from airport to this place,  the campus is huge,  u need a google map to go over to different buildings and finding an exit is  a skill..

name: vani sharma
review: Nice place to work, for visitors paid parking per hour basis.

name: Vyshakh P
review: Decent building, visitors will need to pay parking charges. Also dusty roads close by.

name: Ankit Vashistha
review: Pathetic experience. They call you multiple times to office for interview rounds and in the end can't give you the decent package which is in line with market.

name: Vema Reddy
review: Worst experience.I have attended interview face to face rounds and cleared technical and director rounds. Compensation discussion also happened in director round. After two days â€¦More

name: Mohamed I
review: Awesome place to work. Massive infrastructure. Food is better at cafeteria which on the first floor.

name: Varun Govind
review: Large IT Park in Prestige group. Has many companies. Shuttle service at certain timings to Metro. Few Good Hotel options.

name: Manish Maheshwari
review: Now its Deloitte Company in Velocity Block.Office is so good enivorment and cafeteria is nice.Difficult to get cab after 7pm. â€¦More

name: Nithya Nithya
review: This is my work place. It's nice and calm, and good infrastructure. Maintenance is good. Two entries makes it easy to enter and exit the tech park.

name: Goutham Raj
review: Good place to work if you are not intrested in how much you earn. Learning is unlimited, and you will enjoy most of the free time here. Approx you will work for an Hour out of 8 in a day. â€¦More

name: Siba Swain
review: Nice work place, ample parking in basement. One bad thing is water leaking from roofs in few places in the basement. Cafeteria is good.rainy days you ll get the flooded road to the building,

review: I had a interview in order management with manager Mohan.Can't imagine company like oracle keeping 3rd class ppl as a manger and spoiling company's reputation with poor knowledge.he didn't know the meaning of leader.according to him MS â€¦More

name: Suraj P
review: Access road is a mud road, full of dust. parking for interview is "paid parking", which doesent make sense, inside security is over secure, that we r not even allowed to reception, n had tough time geting in on time.

name: Gopal Samantaray
review: One of the Prestige properties, which has been well managed by the authorities and Oracle itself. The building has its ATM section in ground floor so if you ran out of money inside TP , this is always welcome.

name: Pujan Ghosh
review: One of the best MNC to work for but not for Oracle hardware as they are moving to Cloud computing. Rest, Oracle has a dynamic culture and hire n fire is common. A must work place for a great learning career.

review: It's a good company where you get quality work. The company provides you all the facilities you need such as gym, training, degree etc. It's located at Kadubeesanahalli which is near to marathalli. There are multiple blocks in PTP occupied â€¦More

name: prakash p
review: It's a good company where you get quality work. The company provides you all the facilities you need such as gym, training, degree etc. It's located at Kadubeesanahalli which is near to marathalli. There are multiple blocks in PTP occupied â€¦More

name: akshay muralidhar
review: Needs a few more boards which find the direction to the exit and entrances and to different

name: Aravind S
review: This is the best building Oracle has in PTP with respect to the amenities and food counters. The food court has a good amount of variety with a fair competition among the vendors. They have as usual the north indian, South indian, fruits, â€¦More

name: Sanjana M
review: Don't take it personally, I just hate a guy that works here.

name: Suhas Sj
review: Awesome place to work for fresher. Infrastructure is good. Food quality in cafeteria is maintained well.

name: Anubhav Balodhi (Balo)
review: Oracle office velocity building has its own gym and cafeteria shared with mercury. The building is clean and safe and it's good to work here.

name: akshaynairss
review: Great wide campus oracle has here. It is a little confusing in the begining finding a place and certain places but one of the best it companies with world class structure.

review: Great place to work. Sad that I am working as a contractor here. Manager is friendly, everyone is friendly here

review: Yes this is where i actually work here.Loved the environment ,Infrastructure.Best facility.

review: This is my work place. It's nice and calm, and good infrastructure. Maintenance is good. Two entries makes it easy to enter and exit the tech park.

review: Nice infrastructure. Oracle is placed inside.

review: Building is good... The only problem is that the distance from the main entrance gate is too long .. suggested to take shuttle ..

review: We dont have cafeteria for food and only one coffee shop , that too you should go to ground Floor.

review: Lengthy journey from airport to this place,  the campus is huge,  u need a google map to go over to different buildings and finding an exit is  a skill..

review: Nice place to work, for visitors paid parking per hour basis.

review: Decent building, visitors will need to pay parking charges. Also dusty roads close by.

review: Pathetic experience. They call you multiple times to office for interview rounds and in the end can't give you the decent package which is in line with market.

review: Worst experience.I have attended interview face to face rounds and cleared technical and director rounds. Compensation discussion also happened in director round. After two days â€¦More

review: Awesome place to work. Massive infrastructure. Food is better at cafeteria which on the first floor.

review: This is my work place. It's nice and calm, and good infrastructure. Maintenance is good. Two entries makes it easy to enter and exit the tech park.

review: Good place to work if you are not intrested in how much you earn. Learning is unlimited, and you will enjoy most of the free time here. Approx you will work for an Hour out of 8 in a day. â€¦More

review: Access road is a mud road, full of dust. parking for interview is "paid parking", which doesent make sense, inside security is over secure, that we r not even allowed to reception, n had tough time geting in on time.

review: One of the Prestige properties, which has been well managed by the authorities and Oracle itself. The building has its ATM section in ground floor so if you ran out of money inside TP , this is always welcome.

review: One of the best MNC to work for but not for Oracle hardware as they are moving to Cloud computing. Rest, Oracle has a dynamic culture and hire n fire is common. A must work place for a great learning career.

review: Access road is a mud road, full of dust. parking for interview is "paid parking", which doesent make sense, inside security is over secure, that we r not even allowed to reception, n had tough time geting in on time.

name: Gopal Samantaray
review: One of the Prestige properties, which has been well managed by the authorities and Oracle itself. The building has its ATM section in ground floor so if you ran out of money inside TP , this is always welcome.

name: Pujan Ghosh
review: One of the best MNC to work for but not for Oracle hardware as they are moving to Cloud computing. Rest, Oracle has a dynamic culture and hire n fire is common. A must work place for a great learning career.

name: Gopal Samantaray
review: One of the Prestige properties, which has been well managed by the authorities and Oracle itself. The building has its ATM section in ground floor so if you ran out of money inside TP , this is always welcome.

review: One of the best MNC to work for but not for Oracle hardware as they are moving to Cloud computing. Rest, Oracle has a dynamic culture and hire n fire is common. A must work place for a great learning career.

name: Suraj P
review: Access road is a mud road, full of dust. parking for interview is "paid parking", which doesent make sense, inside security is over secure, that we r not even allowed to reception, n had tough time geting in on time.

name: Gopal Samantaray
review: One of the Prestige properties, which has been well managed by the authorities and Oracle itself. The building has its ATM section in ground floor so if you ran out of money inside TP , this is always welcome.

name: Pujan Ghosh
review: One of the best MNC to work for but not for Oracle hardware as they are moving to Cloud computing. Rest, Oracle has a dynamic culture and hire n fire is common. A must work place for a great learning career.
